title: gofmt: incorrectly aligns structs whose elements are separated by comment lines
body:
by **sdoerner@google.com**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. open http://play.golang.org/p/_qacxShDhp
2. click "Format" (the same happens if you use gofmt -w on your computer)

What is the expected output?

Inside struct "foo", the three data types "int32" should all be
aligned at the same horizontal indent.

What do you see instead?

The data type of the first variable, which is separated off by a comment, is not aligned
with the other two variables.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
Didn't run any compilers.

Which operating system are you using?
Linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
devel +62bf913b4f40

Please provide any additional information below.
